name: RunrVR
description:
Welcome to RUNR, a high-speed, action-packed, VR game. Enjoy running through the 10 different courses going as fast as you can to set new records and beat your personal best! Climb, run, swing, zip, and fling your way through all the unique courses to the upbeat EDM soundtrack and slam the button at the end to stop the timer.  Challenge your friends to beat your best times to truly test your skills!

Note: This game is built for the Oculus Quest and should be installed with SideQuest or the Oculus ADB drivers.
